entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
